Then return the resulting DataFrame.

using DataFrames

function audi_filter(df_cars)
    # Filter rows with manufacturer "audi" and models "a4" or "a4 quattro"
    filtered_df = filter(row -> row["manufacturer"] == "audi" && (row["model"] == "a4" || row["model"] == "a4 quattro"), df_cars)

    # Create a new column `audi_a4_type` with all values set to `true`
